import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import {useDropzone} from 'react-dropzone' import Head from 'next/head' import { Container, Title, Description } from '../styles/pages/Home' import { Context } from '../context/Context' const Home: React.FC = () => { const { canvasRef, lowerText, setLowerText, setUpperText, upperText } = useContext(Context) const {getRootProps, getInputProps} = useDropzone({}) const [name] = useState({ title: 'Meme Generator', description: 'Meme Generator or editing.' }) return ( Meme Generator {name.title} {name.description}
{ alert(canvasRef.current); }}>
setUpperText(e.target.value)} />
setLowerText(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Home
